page.title: 07OUTDOOR PURSUITS CENTRE
page.content: This centre is situated on the Loughborough Road adjacent to the Redhill Circle roundabout. Many exciting outdoor pursuits are taught on the basis of fun with safety. Activities on offer include skiing, climbing, canoeing, sailing, riding, camping, orienteering, absailing and general sports. The council backs the centre because of the increased leisure time in the 80s. There are courses for the disabled and for over-50s as well as family, adult and junior courses. During school summer holidays, special schemes and cheap courses are organised for 10 to 18 year olds at 60p a day.
